name: Love and Fate Soap
description:
Eye-catching handcrafted soap with Chinese writing in white and black with red imprints - all on a beautiful backdrop of jade! Characters mean love, luck, and fate.

This is for 1 bar about 3 oz and is scented with a hint of lime vanilla. 

The gold version is on a translucent gold soap with a scent of strawberries and champagne fragrance.

Design on top of soap will wash off as soap is used. Each bar is uniquely crafted and cut so variations will occur from bar to bar. Soaps will be individually wrapped and presented in a cellophane bag with a matching tie.

Any bulk orders are welcome, please contact me. Thanks so much for looking and check out my other soap creations!

name: Cherry Blossom Soap
description:
Cute cherry blossoms in 2 shades of pink and orange float within different layers in this Japanese cherry blossom scented soap.

This bar is 4 ounces. One measures 3 1/4" x 3 1/4" x 1 1/4".

Each bar is individually crafted and cut so variations will occur from bar to bar. Soaps will be individually wrapped and presented in a cellophane bag with a matching tie.

*A grand opening special - buy 3 Cherry Blossom soaps for only $7.99 - normally $3.50 each.*

Check out my other hand-crafted soaps and other grand opening specials! Thanks so much!

name: Rainbow Starfish Soap
description:
This colorful Rainbow Starfish soap is sure to bring smiles to bath time!

With a hint of English lavender scent, it has layers of rainbow colors carefully created into each soap.

This bar weigh 5 ounces. One measures 4 1/4 x 4 1/4 x 1 3/4".

Each bar is individually crafted and cut so variations will occur from bar to bar. Soaps will be individually wrapped and presented in a cellophane bag with a matching tie.

Check out my other handcrafted soaps and other grand opening specials! Thanks so much!

name: Floating Blossom Soap
description:
Cute flower blossoms floating on top of a white background on top of a pink layer soap. Pink, orange, and blue flower blossoms available! They smell like Japanese Cherry Blossoms - a subtle floral fragrance.

This bar is 4 ounces. One measures 3 1/4" x 3 1/4" x 1 1/4".

Each bar is individually crafted and cut so variations will occur from bar to bar. Soaps will be individually wrapped and presented in a cellophane bag with a matching tie.

Check out my other handcrafted soaps while you're here! Thanks so much!

name: High Heel Pumps Soap
description:
This is a cute pair of high heels soap - check out the variations in the other pictures! This is one shoe with 2 separate halves and two halves together make 2 ounces and is scented with cozy cashmere and pearls.

These make unique and elegant soap favors and can be customized to your choice of colors!

Each bar is uniquely crafted and cut so variations will occur from bar to bar. Soaps will be presented in a cellophane bag with a matching tie.

Any 3 pairs of shoes purchased together will be discounted at $8.00.
Any 6 pairs of heels purchased together will be discounted at $15.25.
Any 12 pairs of heels purchased together will be discounted at $27.0.

The heel style and color can be customized to your liking as well as quantity.

I will email shipping charges for any bulk purchases. International orders are welcome - please email quantity desired.

Check out my store for other unique hand-crafted soaps! Thanks so much for looking!
